languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} (FEL) represents a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to interact with other creatures, to deceive, charm, or befriend them. High Fellowship will help a character find a way to approach a gathering of unsociable servants or to effortlessly make deals with treacherous merchants.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} skills.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительность{/g} (ОБЩ) определяет возможности социального взаимодействия — {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} обманывать, очаровывать или располагать к себе. Персонаж с развитой Общительностью сможет находить общий язык с нелюдимыми слугами и без труда заключать сделки с отъявленными хитрецами.
Эта характеристика влияет на следующие навыки: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Убеждение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Напор{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Коммерция{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Fellowship is the character's ability to interact with other creatures, to deceive, charm, or befriend them. High Fellowship will help the character find an approach to a gathering of unsociable servants or effortlessly make a deal with treacherous merchants.
It also affects Persuasion, Coercion, and Commerce Skills.

Fellowship (FEL) represents a character's ability to interact with other creatures, to deceive, charm, or befriend them. High Fellowship will help a character find a way to approach a gathering of unsociable servants or to effortlessly make deals with treacherous merchants.
It also affects the Persuasion, Coercion, and Commerce skills.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} (FEL) represents a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to interact with other creatures, to deceive, charm, or befriend them. High Fellowship will help a character find a way to approach a gathering of unsociable servants or to effortlessly make deals with treacherous merchants.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} skills.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} (FEL) represents a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to interact with other creatures, to deceive, charm, or befriend them. High Fellowship will help a character find a way to approach a gathering of unsociable servants or to effortlessly make deals with treacherous merchants.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} skills.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}代表角色与其他生物互动的能力，包括欺骗、吸引与结交相关的能力。{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}社交高的角色可以轻而易举地接近一群冷漠的陌生人，也可以毫不费力地与奸诈的商人达成交易。
此外，社交还会影响{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}劝说{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}胁迫{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商业{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}。
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} (FEL) represents a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to interact with other creatures, to deceive, charm, or befriend them. High Fellowship will help a character find a way to approach a gathering of unsociable servants or to effortlessly make deals with treacherous merchants.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}代表角色与其他生物互动的能力，包括欺骗、吸引与结交相关的能力。{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}社交高的角色可以轻而易举地接近一群冷漠的陌生人，也可以毫不费力地与奸诈的商人达成交易。
此外，社交还会影响{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}劝说{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}胁迫{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商业{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}。

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} (EMP) representa la capacidad de un personaje de interactuar con otras criaturas para engañarlas, encantarlas o ganarse su amistad. Un nivel alto de Empatía permite a un personaje acercarse a una reunión de sirvientes antisociales o tratar con mercaderes traicioneros sin mayores dificultades.
También afecta a las habilidades de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasión{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coacción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Comercio{/g}.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} (FEL) represents a character's ability to interact with other creatures, to deceive, charm, or befriend them. High Fellowship will help a character find a way to approach a gathering of unsociable servants or to effortlessly make deals with treacherous merchants.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} skills.

traits.locale_text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} (EMP) representa la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de un personaje de interactuar con otras criaturas para engañarlas, encantarlas o ganarse su amistad. Un nivel alto de Empatía permite a un personaje acercarse a una reunión de sirvientes antisociales o tratar con mercaderes traicioneros sin mayores dificultades.
También afecta a las {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades de{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasión{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coacción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Comercio{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}友情{/g}（FEL）とはキャラクターがその他の生物と交流したり、だましたり、魅了したり、友情関係を結ぶ{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}を示す。友情が高いキャラクターほど無愛想な従者の集まりになじむ方法を見つけたり、悪徳商人と難なく取引をしたりするのに役立つ。
{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}説得{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}強制{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商取引{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}にも影響する。

High Fellowship will help a character find a way to approach a gathering of unsociable servants or to effortlessly make deals with treacherous merchants.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительность{/g} (ОБЩ) определяет возможности социального взаимодействия — способность обманывать, очаровывать или располагать к себе. Персонаж с развитой Общительностью сможет находить общий язык с нелюдимыми слугами и без труда заключать сделки с отъявленными хитрецами.
Эта характеристика влияет на следующие {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыки{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Убеждение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Напор{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Коммерция{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительность{/g} (ОБЩ) определяет возможности социального взаимодействия — способность обманывать, очаровывать или располагать к себе. Персонаж с развитой Общительностью сможет находить общий язык с нелюдимыми слугами и без труда заключать сделки с отъявленными хитрецами.
Эта характеристика влияет на следующие {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыки{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Убеждение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Напор{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Коммерция{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} (GEF) steht für die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} eines Charakters, mit anderen Kreaturen zu interagieren, sie zu täuschen, zu bezaubern oder sich mit ihnen anzufreunden. Ein hoher Gefolgschaftswert hilft einem Charakter, einen Weg zu finden, sich einer Versammlung von ungeselligen Dienern zu nähern oder mühelos Geschäfte mit verräterischen Händlern zu machen.
Beeinflusst auch die {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Überredung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Zwang{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Handel{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} (FEL) represents a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to interact with other creatures, to deceive, charm, or befriend them. High Fellowship will help a character find a way to approach a gathering of unsociable servants or to effortlessly make deals with treacherous merchants.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} skills.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} (GEF) repräsentiert die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} eines Charakters, mit anderen Kreaturen zu interagieren, sie zu täuschen, zu bezaubern oder sich mit ihnen anzufreunden. Ein hoher Gefolgschaftswert hilft einem Charakter, einen Weg zu finden, sich einer Versammlung von ungeselligen Dienern zu nähern oder mühelos Geschäfte mit verräterischen Händlern zu machen.
Beeinflusst auch die {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Überredung{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Zwang{/g}- und {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Handel{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g}.

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} (SOC) représente la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} d'un personnage à interagir avec d'autres, à les duper, à les charmer ou à se lier d'amitié avec eux. Un niveau élevé de Sociabilité l'aidera à trouver un moyen d'approcher une assemblée de serviteurs peu sociables ou à trouver facilement un accord avec des marchands perfides.
La Sociabilité influe également sur les compétences {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercition{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}.

High Fellowship will help a character find a way to approach a gathering of unsociable servants or to effortlessly make deals with treacherous merchants.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} skills.

traits.locale_text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fraternité{/g} (FRA) représente la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} d'un personnage à interagir avec d'autres, à les duper, à les charmer ou à se lier d'amitié avec eux. Un niveau élevé de Fraternité aidera un personnage à trouver un moyen d'approcher une assemblée de serviteurs peu sociables ou à trouver facilement un accord avec des marchands perfides.
La Fraternité influe également sur les {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercition{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}.

La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} (SOC) représente la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} d'un personnage à interagir avec d'autres, à les duper, à les charmer ou à se lier d'amitié avec eux. Un niveau élevé de Sociabilité aidera un personnage à trouver un moyen d'approcher une assemblée de serviteurs peu sociables ou à trouver facilement un accord avec des marchands perfides.
La Sociabilité influe également sur les {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Intimidation{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}.
